DOC.brief_summary: This purpose study evaluate early time onset action adult erectile dysfunction ( often call impotence ) . In study vardenafil compare placebo . Patients ask fill questionnaire diary fill detail attempt sexual activity study period . Patients receive also stopwatch record time onset erection . Stopwatch start immediately prior initiate sexual activity stop erection perceive adequate penetration obtain .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Time Onset Action 10 mg 20 mg Vardenafil Compared Placebo Males With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Males ED 6 month accord NIH Consensus statement ( inability attain and/or maintain penile erection sufficient satisfactory sexual performance ) Heterosexual relationship 18 year old Primary hypoactive sexual desire History myocardial infarction , stroke life threaten arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrates nitric oxide donor use Other exclusion criterion accord US Product Information
